Class PlugableProject

    public final class PlugableProject
extends java.lang.Object
implements PluginTarget, io.spine.logging.Logging
    An implementation of PluginTarget based on a Gradle Project.

    • Method Detail

      • with

        public <P extends org.gradle.api.Plugin<org.gradle.api.Project>> void with(GradlePlugin<P> pluginType,
                                                                           java.util.function.Consumer<P> action)
        Description copied from interface: PluginTarget
        Executes the given action if the given plugin is applied.

        If the plugin is already applied, the action is executed at once. If the plugin is NOT applied, the action is only executed when and it the plugin will be applied.

        Specified by:
        with in interface PluginTarget
        Parameters:
        pluginType - the trigger plugin
        action - the action to execute
